questions.text: What is the capital of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa?
questions.explanation: Peshawar is the capital and largest city of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province.

questions.text: The Swat Valley is located in which division?
questions.explanation: Swat Valley is located in Malakand Division of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.

questions.text: Nanga Parbat is located in which mountain range?
questions.explanation: Nanga Parbat (8,126m) is located in the western Himalayas in Gilgit-Baltistan.

questions.text: The Torkham border crossing connects Pakistan with:
questions.explanation: Torkham is a border crossing between Pakistan and Afghanistan through the Khyber Pass.
The Kabul River flows near Peshawar before joining the Indus River.

questions.text: Tirich Mir is the highest peak of which mountain range?
questions.explanation: Tirich Mir (7,708m) is the highest peak of the Hindu Kush range, located in Chitral.

questions.text: Kaghan Valley is located in which district?
questions.explanation: Kaghan Valley is a beautiful valley located in Mansehra district of KPK.

questions.text: The Tarbela Dam is built on which river?
questions.explanation: Tarbela Dam is built on the Indus River in Haripur District, KPK.

questions.text: FATA was merged into Khyber Pakhtunkhwa in which year?
questions.explanation: FATA was merged into KPK through the 25th Constitutional Amendment in May 2018.

questions.text: Chitral is famous for which unique ethnic group?
questions.explanation: Chitral is home to the Kalash people, known for their unique culture and traditions.
